channel.title: Crazy-Pkz Release (same as other one, some new info) over 3 k downloads
channel.description:
well alot of you know exielz as the owner of crazy-pkz but he sold it to me, and i have coded it alot, and now im releasing, so do not flame me.
so here are some things the server includes
full combat mith drag minigame gwd veng veng other full mage pvp following statius spec 100% vesta spec 100% dclaws spec 100% 4 hits you cant teleport in combat you cannot attack whit 1 item multi spells perfect ancients fixet the freezing problem c'bow works now made the crystal bow dont need arrows Dragon Claws Hammer Dragon claw spec hammer spec better armydal godsword added premium member ship new skiller shop 1 ip per connection blocking google bot and syipkpkers item keep on death (need client) stats equip (need client) dupes are fixet almost 100% Multi sig fixet attack option There is much more..
soz if i wrote somethings twice, was copying from my release on google, if any of you want to know, i am jared from google and that is it. if you do not beleive i will pm you.,
here is the download link..
[center][u][b][size=25pt]OK GUYS HERES THE FIXED DL LINK RIGHT UNDERNEATH THIS[/size] [/b][/u][/center] [URL=http://uppit.com/v/G5XMG021]Uppit Dl Link[/URL]
CREDITS me- 15%- FOR DOING edititng etc... tuts- 5% as without them i wouldn't have learned how to code delta- 80%- for making the base, as delta is basically done already, just adding things to it.
PICS- the pics don't realy show all the features, just how popular it was... =\
SERVER USED TO BE HUGE :)-[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/ivh743.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/23szwn8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/p3y8k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/t69mxl.jpg[/img] [size=15pt]MORE PICS VERY SOON[/size]
enjoy everyone. [size=8pt]i know asking for rep is bad but its greatly appreciated as i just started and would like to get further on.[/size]
I WILL ALSO INCLUDE THE CLIENT, IT IS SIMPLY BLUURS CLIENT, IT IS IN NO WAY MINE. I JUST EDITED MINE.
LINK= [url=http://bluurr.co.uk/files/bluurrs%20client.zip] The Client[/url]
